name: RunTestOnSofy
description: Add a pipeline task to test your application on Sofy.ai
author: waqas@sofy.ai

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Please enter the API key associated with your account:
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Please enter your Sofy.ai API Key.
To generate a new key login to your account at [Sofy.ai](https://www.sofy.ai) and select "Regenerate key" in Account Settings => API Key

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Select Type of your application:
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of application you would like Sofy to test. Select 'Mobile' for Android/iOS Apps and 'Website' for Web Apps

inputs.name: apk_location
inputs.label: Path to build output application file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the '.apk' or '.ipa' file to use to stage a test run. You can use wildcards (e.g. **/*.apk for all .apk files in all subfolders relative to your build workspace).
